com.camerontec.catalys.server.mouldudp64

Class UdpChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.mouldudp64.UdpChannel

  • public class UdpChannel
extends Object
    An UDP multicast/unicast channel for client or server.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UdpChannel

        public UdpChannel(ILogger logger,
                  boolean isServer,
                  boolean isMulticast,
                  int port,
                  String hostAddress,
                  String networkInterfaceName)
           throws IOException
        Create UDP multicast/unicast channel
        Parameters:
        logger - logging system
        isServer - whether this channel server or client
        isMulticast - whether this channel multicast or unicast
        port - host port
        hostAddress - host address
        networkInterfaceName - name of the network interface.
        Throws:
        IOException - if channel could not be open

    • Method Detail

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        If channel is open
        Returns:
        true if open, false otherwise

           throws IOException

        Parameters:

        Throws:

        public void read(ByteBuffer buf)
          throws IOException
        Read data from multicast channel
        Parameters:
        buf - data to multicast
        Throws:
        IOException - if write failed

      • isMembershipKeyValid

        public boolean isMembershipKeyValid()
        Return if multicast joining key is valid
        Returns:
        false if key is not valid or this channel represent multicast server

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Close multicast channel
        Throws:
        IOException - if write failed
